name: New York Tsunami Simulator (Entry for the Geopipe Gamejam)
name_original: New York Tsunami Simulator (Entry for the Geopipe Gamejam)
description:
I made this game with the assets of Geopipe  for the NYC GameJam

I added to the map my own original models for the waves and  the bus, each second the level of the sea is increasing until cover all the city

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move

Spacebar to jump or swim

Note: I dont could add more things because I was a bit busy, also I was correcting a lot of bugs in the development, I hope you like it ^^
